text: On 29th July, the trains will leave form Colombo Fort at 5.00 a.m., 7.10 a.m., and 7.55 a.m.On 30th July, three return trains will leave from Anuradhapura to Colombo Fort at 1.40 a.m., 9.30 a.m., and 12.30 noon.In addition, additional compartments have been attached to Yaldevi and Rajarata Rajina express trains.Railway Department announces that six special trains will be deployed on 29th and 30th July for the pilgrims participating in the Pichcha Mal Poojawa to be held in Anuradhapura. On 29th July, the trains will leave form Colombo Fort at 5.00 a.m., 7.10 a.m., and 7.55 a.m.On 30th July, three return trains will leave from Anuradhapura to Colombo Fort at 1.40 a.m., 9.30 a.m., and 12.30 noon.In addition, additional compartments have been attached to Yaldevi and Rajarata Rajina express trains.
title: Special trains for Pichcha Mal Poojawa in Anuradhapura
